movie.title: Super Star Super Silly
movie.description_intro: Story about twins: The Son is a superstar and The Tung is a farmer. They changed position.
movie.description_full: Story about twins: The Son is a superstar and The Tung is a farmer. They changed position.

movies.title: The 101-Year-Old Man Who Skipped Out on the Bill and Disappeared
movies.title_english: The 101-Year-Old Man Who Skipped Out on the Bill and Disappeared
movies.title_long: The 101-Year-Old Man Who Skipped Out on the Bill and Disappeared (2016)
movies.summary: The sequel of "The 100 year-old man who climbed out the window and disappeared" continues with more flashbacks from Allan Karlsson long and adventurous double agent life. Allan introduces the Russian "folksoda" which ignite a new adventure.
movies.description_full: The sequel of "The 100 year-old man who climbed out the window and disappeared" continues with more flashbacks from Allan Karlsson long and adventurous double agent life. Allan introduces the Russian "folksoda" which ignite a new adventure.
movies.synopsis: The sequel of "The 100 year-old man who climbed out the window and disappeared" continues with more flashbacks from Allan Karlsson long and adventurous double agent life. Allan introduces the Russian "folksoda" which ignite a new adventure.

movies.title: The Gentleman from Epsom
movies.summary: The story takes place in the racecourses around Paris. A so-called major sells his tips to naive characters.
movies.description_full: The story takes place in the racecourses around Paris. A so-called major sells his tips to naive characters.
movies.synopsis: The story takes place in the racecourses around Paris. A so-called major sells his tips to naive characters.

movies.title: Achilles and the Tortoise
movies.summary: Machisu is a painter. He never had the success he thinks he is entitled to. Regardless of this, he always remains trying to be successful. His wife Sachiko keeps supporting him, despite all setbacks.
movies.description_full: Machisu is a painter. He never had the success he thinks he is entitled to. Regardless of this, he always remains trying to be successful. His wife Sachiko keeps supporting him, despite all setbacks.
movies.synopsis: Machisu is a painter. He never had the success he thinks he is entitled to. Regardless of this, he always remains trying to be successful. His wife Sachiko keeps supporting him, despite all setbacks.

movies.title: Joe Versus the Volcano
movies.summary: Joe versus the Volcano is a fable which opens with somewhat surrealistic scenes of the dehumanization of Joe Bank's job and work environment (at a company whose product rather literally screws people) with imagery that seems to have been inspired by the classic film Metropolis. Joe is diagnosed with an incurable disease, quits his dehumanizing job, and accepts an offer to briefly "live like a king, die like a man" - but to fulfill his agreement he must willingly jump into a live volcano on the island of Waponi Woo in order to appease the volcano god. En route to the island, Joe meets a series of interesting characters in NYC and LA, then boards a yacht, captained by Patricia Graynamore. During the voyage Joe and Patricia survive disaster, fall in love, and finally arrive at the island where they face their destiny.
